mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, password, user_name, mail, adress, phone, admin_num, manager_num, create_user_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{password}, #{user_name}, #{mail}, #{adress}, #{phone}, false, false, now())
